title: England Women to play friendly against Czech Repubic next month
text:
England Women will travel to face the Czech Republic for a friendly in Ceske Budejovice next month.

Phil Neville's side will meet the Czechs on November 12, just three days after their sold-out friendly against Germany at Wembley.

Neville said: 'It is great to have secured this away fixture which follows what I know will be a momentous occasion at Wembley against Germany in front of a sell-out crowd.'

Phill Neville's England will face Germany and the Czech Republic in friendly's next month

England ended a five-game run without a win with victory over Portugal earlier this month.

The Lionesses have automatic qualification for the European Championships 2021 as host nation but the win against Portugal is their only victory since the summer's Women's World Cup.

The sell-out game against Germany is set to be the highest attended fixture in the women's game in England, surpassing the 80,023 who saw the United States win gold against Japan at the 2012 Olympics.
description: England women will play against Czech Reublic in a friendly next month. The match in Ceske Budejovice will be three days follwoing the Lionesses sold-out match vs Germany at Wembley.
